page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: There is one school in the village,it is Glyncorrwg Primary School.The school has a nursery department,an infant department and a junior department.There are 131 pupils at the school, a headteacher, 7 full-time teachers, 1 part-time teacher, a nursery nurse and a part-time nursery nurse. The nursery opens for two sessions a day but also has a small group of reception-class children who attend both sessions. All the classes are mixed-ability and mixed age ranges. The nearest secondary school is two and a half miles away and all the children leaving the primary school attend this comprehensive school at Cymmer.
